meanings.definition: Figulines: objects made of clay or other materials by a potter
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient figulines crafted by skilled potters.
meanings.sent2: She collected colorful figulines from different cultures around the world.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the delicate figulines, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with figulines, each telling a unique story through clay.
meanings.sent5: The artisan carefully shaped the figulines, bringing life to the inert clay.

meanings.definition: Figulines: pertaining to or characteristic of pottery or ceramics
meanings.sent1: The art class focused on creating figulines using various techniques.
meanings.sent2: The figulines exhibition showcased the beauty of ceramic artistry.
meanings.sent3: His figulines-inspired design for the vase received praise for its creativity.
meanings.sent4: The figulines patterns on the plate resembled intricate ceramic mosaics.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated with figulines vases, adding an elegant touch to the space.
